column1: each time she looked into mason 's face , she was grateful that he looked nothing like his [MASK] .
his platinum [MASK] hair and blue eyes were completely hers .
it was [MASK] his build that he was taking after his father .
where megan was a [MASK] 5'3 '' , davis was 6'1 '' and two hundred pounds .
mason was already registering off the charts in height and [MASK] according to his pediatrician .
davis had seen mason only twice in his lifetime-the day he had been born and the day he came home [MASK] the hospital .
after that , he had [MASK] been interested in any of the pictures and emails megan sent .
with his professional football career on the rise , davis [MASK] n't wanted to be shackled with the responsibilities of a baby .
instead , he wanted to spend his time off the [MASK] partying until all hours of the night .
[MASK] only paid child support when megan threatened to have his wages garnished .
